Package socialradar.locationkit

LocationKit(TM) for Android -- LocationKit is an advanced SDK that provides enhanced location capabilities to Android and iOS mobile apps.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    ILocationKitBinder
    Bind to the LocationKitService and receive an instance ILocationKitBinder that is used to interact with the service and remote apis as shown in this example.
    ILocationKitCallback<T>
    generic interface for handling asynchronous callbacks from LocationKit services T represents the type of model being returned.
    ILocationKitEventListener
    defines an event listener interface for event callbacks from LocationKit which is registered when calling ILocationKitBinder.startWithApiToken.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    LocationKitBootReceiver
    An Android BootReceiver used by LocationKit to automatically restart Location monitoring when a phone is powered on.
    LocationKitResult  
    LocationKitService  
    LocationKitServiceOptions
    configures optional LocationKitService settings for use on startup.
    LocationKitServiceOptions.Builder
    Constructs @{link LocationKitServiceOptions} with attributes specified.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    LocationKitResult.ResultType  

Package socialradar.locationkit Description

LocationKit(TM) for Android -- LocationKit is an advanced SDK that provides enhanced location capabilities to Android and iOS mobile apps.

Features Include:

Higher Accuracy
Lower Battery Drain
Automatic Venue Detection
Detailed Location Analytics for app developers via a web portal

Requirements

LocationKit for Android supports API Level 15 and above (Ice Cream Sandwich MR1) with Google Play Services

AndroidManifest.xml

LocationKit merges the following items into the AndroidManifest.xml at build time.

Permissions

The following permissions are needed for LocationKit to run.
android.permission.ACCESS_FINE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_COARSE_LOCATION
android.permission.ACCESS_NETWORK_STATE -- used with WIFI_STATE to reduce power usage and improve location using network data
android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE
android.permission.INTERNET -- needed to communicate with back end web services
android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED -- allows application tracking to restart on reboot.
android.permission.WAKE_LOCK
com.google.android.gms.permission.ACTIVITY_RECOGNITION -- improves battery performance by coordinating collection with activity

Application Elements

.LocationKitService -- an Android service that provides an interface for the SDK
.LocationKitBootReceiver -- a boot receiver that allows LocationKit to automatically re-start when a phone is powered on

Third Party Libraries

The following third party library dependencies are automatically added if needed to your project through the gradle build system. Third party libraries are copyright their respective authors and used under license provided by same.

Gson 2.3.+ @see
Retrofit 1.9.+ @see
See Also:
https://locaitonkit.io/
